title: [Ta'Illistim, Glimaer Wey]
description: The facade of the Sylvarrglin Moving Company stands beside the cobbled wey, its grey-blue stone exterior worn smooth by the elements.  A city guardsman, ever watchful for signs of trouble, stands at attention on either side of the door.

The facade of the Sylvarrglin Moving Company stands beside the cobbled wey, its grey-blue stone exterior worn smooth by the elements.  Twin torches burn brightly at either side of the structure, casting dim circles of light on the wey.  A city guardsman, ever watchful for signs of trouble, stand at attention on either side of the door.
